requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Processor 1.6 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphical Card with 256 megabytes of video memory and support of DirectX 9.0.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP and newer
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio

  • Processor: Intel Core 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
